title: UAVs are making a big difference in Armenia-Azerbaijan conflict. How much do Azerbaijani UAVs cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: They dont really made that big difference. E.g., on the sixth day of the Azero-Turkish aggression against the Armenian states, it is already reported about 107 Azerbaijani UAVs, 10 Azerbaijani helicopters and 5 Azerbaijani jets shot down by the Armenian air defence.  Հակառակորդի կորուստները՝ 6 օրում. 1750 սպանված, 107 ԱԹՍ, 10 ուղղաթիռ, 205 զրահատեխնիկա, 5 ինքնաթիռ, 1 սմերչ
